feed.title: The Realm of Data Science
feed.subtitle: A website featuring my side projects and views appertaining to the realm of data science.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content:
This is just a little blog I’m starting. I’ll aim to get something up once a week or so, something interesting and technical.

I hope you like it!
